original_title: The Greatest Fights of Martial Arts: Part II
overview: Martial arts fans will delight in this collection of some of the most exciting match-ups in martial arts history. Chock-full of the best fighters the sport has to offer, this release combines relentless action, uncompromising grit and astounding skill for one heart-pounding thrill ride! Featuring masters of their craft facing off against one another in high-stakes duels, this is kung fu at its very best.
title: The Greatest Fights of Martial Arts: Part II
